main event: A civilian observed a blue-white light in the sky for approximately 7 minutes on December 8, 1966.
interesting points: The light appeared in the north-northeast sky and abruptly disappeared behind power lines., The observer's son called attention to the light while observing Christmas decorations., The sighting occurred on a clear and dark night., The object's behavior was consistent with that of a satellite., The report concluded that the object was possibly a satellite.
witness description: Mrs. [Redacted], a 44-year-old housewife from Monroe, New York
